title: [xCluster][Unit Test] Flaky unit test XClusterYSqlTestConsistentTransactionsTest.UnevenTxnStatusTablets

labels.name: kind/enhancement
labels.description: This is an enhancement of an existing feature

body:
Jira Link: [DB-8111](https://yugabyte.atlassian.net/browse/DB-8111)
### Description

Test XClusterYSqlTestConsistentTransactionsTest.UnevenTxnStatusTablets failing with error accross the builds
```
Execute of 'delete from test_table_0;' failed: 7, message: ERROR:  Tablet 91f16c90239b4fb7851aeb9506172b4e not running: . Errors from tablet servers: [Service unavailable (yb/master/catalog_manager.cc:11734): Tablet 91f16c90239b4fb7851aeb9506172b4e not running] (pgsql error XX000) (aux msg ERROR:  Tablet 91f16c90239b4fb7851aeb9506172b4e not running: . Errors from tablet servers: [Service unavailable (yb/master/catalog_manager.cc:11734): Tablet 91f16c90239b4fb7851aeb9506172b4e not running])
```

Test failure stack trace:
```

${BUILD_ROOT}/../../src/yb/integration-tests/xcluster/xcluster_ysql-test.cc:1550:     @     0x5605156b039d  yb::XClusterYSqlTestConsistentTransactionsTest_UnevenTxnStatusTablets_Test::TestBody()
I0926 04:52:37.071481  6914 xcluster_test_base.cc:109] Destroying CDC Clusters
2023-09-26 04:52:37.071 UTC [7763] LOG:  received fast shutdown request
2023-09-26 04:52:37.089 UTC [7763] LOG:  aborting any active transactions
2023-09-26 04:52:37.089 UTC [7777] FATAL:  terminating background worker "YSQL webserver" due to administrator command
2023-09-26 04:52:37.094 UTC [7763] LOG:  background worker "YSQL webserver" (PID 7777) exited with exit code 1
2023-09-26 04:52:37.095 UTC [7780] LOG:  shutting down
2023-09-26 04:52:37.144 UTC [7763] LOG:  database system is shut down
[C] I0926 04:52:37.148180  7764 process_wrapper.cc:67] PostgreSQL exited normally
[C-ts-1] I0926 04:52:37.151134  6914 tablet_server.cc:673] TabletServer shutting down...
```
Stability: [https://detective.dev.yugabyte.com/stability/test?analyze_trends=true&branch=master&class=XClusterYSqlTestConsistentTransactionsTest&name=UnevenTxnStatusTablets](https://detective.dev.yugabyte.com/stability/test?analyze_trends=true&branch=master&class=XClusterYSqlTestConsistentTransactionsTest&name=UnevenTxnStatusTablets)
